MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW9 postcode area of Wincham, Northwich affecting properties in Birch Grove, John Fryer Avenue and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  7:18AM. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 10:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:25AM 31st March 2021
